Comments_List: This course successfully explored the concept of cities, specifically after colonization. The class proved the influence of colonization in urban landscapes, and especially in American cities. The class taught me how to critically analyze literature and film.
The syllabus is amazing--all the readings and viewings come together really interestingly.
This class is very strong in the amount of time dedicated to close analysis - we spent about 2 hours straight every week just discussing our ideas.
Yes! Really fun and interesting material.
I would definitely recommend this class to another student. The course covered socially relevant topics that are often overlooked by other American Studies classes.
